title: Google adds Mei’s Red Panda from Pixar’s ‘Turning Red’ to its collection of 3D animals
content:
After going viral back in 2020, Google has slowly expanded its collection of 3D animals and objects in Search. Now, Google is adding a fun one: a 3D dancing model of Mei’s Red Panda from Pixar’s latest film, Turning Red.

more…

The post Google adds Mei’s Red Panda from Pixar’s ‘Turning Red’ to its collection of 3D animals appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has added a 3D red panda to Search which comes from the Pixar film Turning Red, and it dances just like in the movie.
